input_args.passage: '1,800 games | 1,800 games, Parker Brothers, founded in Salem, Massachusetts in 1883, published more than 1,800 games during its existence. To this day, many of their products—such as Monopoly, Clue, Risk, Sorry!, and Ouija—probably still live on shelves or in closets around your home., more than 1,800'
input_args.claim: 'From source, it is stated that Parker Brothers published more than 1,800 games during its existence.'
